methods.name: get

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The unique key for the stored data

methods.returnsDescription: The stored value, or undefined if the key does not exist

methods.name: set
methods.description: Store a value associated with a key

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key under which to store the value

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Delete a specific key and its associated value

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Remove all stored keys and values

methods.name: has
methods.description: Check if a specific key exists in storage
